caseStudies.title: Enhancing Product Exploration with VR Factory Walkthrough
caseStudies.description: A leading iron and steel manufacturer struggled to effectively showcase their products and operations. Karanji’s VR 'Factory Walkthrough' solution offered an immersive, hands-on experience for clients and employees. This case study demonstrates how the VR module improved product understanding, engagement, and onboarding.

sections.content: A leading company in the iron and steel manufacturing industry faced challenges in effectively showcasing their diverse range of products and the complexities of their factory operations to prospective clients and new employees. While they had detailed catalogs and offered physical tours, these methods lacked the engagement and depth necessary to truly highlight the quality and specifications of their products. Clients and employees, particularly those interested in understanding the specific features and applications of various products, were seeking a solution that provided more immersive, hands-on insights.

To meet this demand, Karanji introduced the “Factory Walkthrough” VR experience. This innovative solution allows users to virtually explore the factory, gaining detailed insights into the products and operations, thus bridging the gap between superficial awareness and deep understanding.
The creation of the “Factory Walkthrough” VR experience presented several key challenges:

items: Incorporating detailed views of various products and their specific features.
Ensuring ease of use for individuals unfamiliar with VR technology.
Blending interactive and informational elements to keep users engaged.
Enhanced Understanding of Product Features: The VR walkthrough provided users with a deeper understanding of each product’s features and applications.
Increased Engagement: The immersive nature of the VR experience made product exploration memorable and engaging.
Personalized User-Driven Factory Tours: Users could tailor their experience, exploring different departments and gaining insights at their own pace.

sections.content: The “Factory Walkthrough” VR allows users to explore the company’s iron and steel products within a virtual factory environment. Users can navigate around various departments, witnessing firsthand how the manufacturing processes unfold.
This virtual walkthrough mimics a physical tour, providing a detailed, interactive experience that offers a deep dive into the company's operations and product offerings..

Karanji assembled a team of VR experts, video developers, & instructional designers to create the comprehensive VR walkthrough. Each team member played a critical role in ensuring that the experience was both engaging & educational

items: Instructional Designers: Translated complex product features into understandable, engaging content.
Video Developers: Crafted lifelike factory environments, displaying products with realistic detail.
VR Experts: Made the experience user-friendly and visually engaging across all tech levels.
Client Engagement: Increased by 70% due to immersive exploration.
Sales Growth: 25% increase in sales within the first 6 months.
Employee Onboarding: Reduced training time and improved operational efficiency.

sections.content: I’ve never experienced such a detailed and immersive way to explore products.
This VR module made my onboarding process so smooth. It thoroughly helped me understand our products and factory layout before even stepping into the physical space.
